title._content: Horatian Tower and Pavilion, Beech Hill, Keene NH

description._content: TITLE Horatian Tower and Pavilion, Beech Hill, Keene NH CREATOR French, J.A., Keene NH SUBJECT Landscape pavilions - NH - Keene Observation towers - NH - Keene DESCRIPTION Photograph of the Horatian Tower and Pavilion, Beech Hill, Keene New Hampshire. A wooden 35 foot observation tower was constructed and scenic drives laid out by Horatio L. Goodnow in 1890. "Sunday afternoon rides to Beech Hill and a climb to the top of the tower fast became a popular pastime." The park was named in honor of Horatio. PUBLISHER Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County DATE DIGITAL 20091102 DATE ORIGINAL 1870-1889? RESOURCE TYPE photographs FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER HS255-P791 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known copyright restrictions.
